title: Math tutor for high school
description: I amd a Math graduate and graduated with honors in the university of Barcelona I can give you theoretical classes and practical labs where we go through problems and their solutions

title: Sage Barista Pro portafilter machine
description:
My Sage Barista Pro is for sale because I'm moving.
- regularly descaled
- rinsed almost daily with coffee degreaser
- very good condition, fine scratches, but nothing major and no dents
- 4sieves and accessories included
- heats up very quicly thanks to its thermoblock

if you have any questions, just write a short message :-)

title: Laptop case CAISKIN
description: I am selling a laptop bag from Caiskin. It is medium grey and is very soft on the inside with a zip and a compartment on the side and also a zip, which was left over from a laptop. New condition. You can also pick it up on site. PS: The length is 35 cm, width 25 cm, thickness is 1.5 cm, there is room for the laptop in the bag.

title: Electrician (m/f/d) Join our team - immediately and permanently
description:
We are looking for electrical experts to expand our team! Do you still exist?

Your qualifications:

    Trained electrician (m/f/d) or similar

Your advantages:

    Secure basis – permanent employment contract

    Great reward models – whether it’s a loyalty bonus or a switching bonus, you won’t go away empty-handed with us

    Top pay – Guaranteed from €18 per hour

    Your birthday is sacred to us, so you have this day off

    Family-friendly conditions – 30 days vacation

    Employees recruit employees up to €1,000.00 on TOP

    Securing for the future – through a company pension plan

    Support – weekly installment payments upon request

    Mobility – company bike with favorable conditions

    Attractive employee discounts – at over 800 top brands (travel, shopping)

Your skills:

    Monitor and maintain building services and systems

    Carrying out tests according to VDE 0100

    Testing and measuring electrical safety devices

    Laying of cables

    Setting junction boxes
